metadata.synopsis: One of four messenger rats being trained in Jaheira's basement. The rats themselves are there for flavour and need to remain a single voiceline only each, but could do with conveying why Jaheira has multiple rats and a badger in her basement - IE for delivering messages around Baldur's Gate.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to Jaheira's Basement- Talk to the ratsJaheira Basement Bookmark: larian://bookmark?name=CTY_JaheiraBasement&mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=-1537.007690;17.081484;1028.876221&camTarget=-1537.406860;16.317995;1028.368530

0.speaker: Messenger Rat
0.text: Boss says this work makes us honorary... Harlots? Harpies? Sounds nice.
0.context: NodeContext: Failing to remember the word 'Harper'

2.speaker: Messenger Rat
2.text: Down by the Blushing Mermaid, there's a stink of something fey. Smell of arse, too, but boss doesn't care about that.
